alert.note: Alert for Dare (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 7:01PM EDT until June 27 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL DARE COUNTY... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buffalo City, or 8 miles northwest of Stumpy Point, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stumpy Point, Manns Harbor, Manteo, East Lake, Buffalo City and Wanchese. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
